        public Properties getProperties()
        Get the properties set on the Across entity. These properties will be available when the entity is being bootstrapped.
        Returns:
        Properties set directly on the Across entity.

      • setProperties

        public void setProperties(Properties properties)
        Set the property collection on the Across entity. These should be available during bootstrap of the entity.
        Parameters:
        properties - Properties to make available during bootstrap.

      • setProperty

               Object value)

      • addPropertySources

        Add PropertySources to the context.
        Parameters:

      • addPropertySources

        public abstract void addPropertySources(org.springframework.core.env.PropertySource<?>... propertySources)
        Add PropertySources to the context.
        Parameters:
        propertySources - One or more PropertySource instances.

      • addPropertySources

        public void addPropertySources(org.springframework.core.io.Resource... resources)

        Adds one or more Resources instances for properties loading to the context. These will be registered as PropertySource.

        If a resource does not exist, it will be silently ignored.

        Parameters:
        resources - Resources to add.
        See Also:
        PropertySource
